og.description:
Billionaire developer Donald Trump is still holding his own in a new Fox News poll, but establishment candidates Jeb Bush, Scott Walker and Marco Rubio are all losing traction.
Poll is continuing to dominate with 25 percent support nationally while retired neurosurgeon Ben...
